channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole in dual carriageway., 29th December
item.description:
Location makes it too dangerous to take a photograph of this pothole. It’s located just after the A38 road becomes a dual carriageway heading away from Coombe Hill and towards Tewkesbury. This pothole is of a size that viciously disorients vehicles, for those that drive through it or try to avoid it thus obstructing other vehicles. This pothole has become increasingly worse over the last five months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Deerhurst, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flags on lamp posts, 29th December
item.description:
Flags attached to lamp posts either side of the railway bridge causing health and safety risk. Flags also appear to be hung improperly and disrespectfully.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Bishop's Cleeve
